meta.description: Optimize the number of toy types to manufacture to maximize profit given resource constraints and logical conditions.

sets.name: TOYS
sets.description: Types of toys that can be manufactured.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling one unit of each toy type.

params.name: wood_required
params.description: Wood required to manufacture one unit of each toy type.

params.name: steel_required
params.description: Steel required to manufacture one unit of each toy type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of toy to manufacture.

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether a type of toy is manufactured.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from manufacturing toys.

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.description: Total wood used cannot exceed available wood.

constraints.name: steel_constraint
constraints.description: Total steel used cannot exceed available steel.

constraints.name: truck_train_exclusion
constraints.description: If trucks are manufactured, trains cannot be manufactured and vice versa.

constraints.name: boat_plane_dependency
constraints.description: If boats are manufactured, planes must also be manufactured.

constraints.name: boat_train_limit
constraints.description: The number of toy boats manufactured cannot exceed the number of toy trains manufactured.

constraints.name: truck_binary_link
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for trucks.

constraints.name: plane_binary_link
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for planes.

constraints.name: boat_binary_link
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for boats.

constraints.name: train_binary_link
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for trains.
